Text:
welp, after dling and installing and tryin this,, theres a problem..

it seems to be in some other language. i cant read anything .....

any ideas?
i'm thinkin its just the cracked exe that wrong, cuz the main setup.exe is suppost to be in EN. so we need a english crack.
nevermind, in the launcher, there is a choice to change to English... ok now
You can change language in in the settings.ini: Lang=English.lng . Happy derails! :D Thats fun game stiffy:) thanks!
I just found that you can mess with different settings with zdsimulator.exe
